| HistoryText             = The Legion of Living Lightning was a group of soldiers and scientists dedicated to overthrowing the world's governments. Most of the original group died when their Lightning Machine overloaded in a conflict with the Incredible Hulk.{{r|Tales to Astonish #97}}

[[Miguel Santos (Earth-616)|Miguel Santos]], son of one of the Legion, accidentally connected himself to the Lightning Machine while exploring the demolished base. This transformed him into a super-being called the Living Lightning.{{r|Avengers: West Coast #63}}

The renamed Lords of the Living Lightning eventually resurfaced as a thorn in [[Strategic_Homeland_Intervention,_Enforcement_and_Logistics_Division_(Earth-616)|S.H.I.E.L.D.]]'s paw.{{r|Nick Fury's Howling Commandos #1}}
